Class TiledMap.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.rabbittownsoftware.jtiled.TiledMap.Builder
Enclosing class:
TiledMap
public static class TiledMap.Builder extends Object
Builder for constructing immutable TiledMap instances.

Example usage: 

 TiledMap map = new TiledMap.Builder()
      .setWidth(100)
      .setHeight(50)
      .setTileWidth(16)
      .setTileHeight(16)
      .setLayers(layers)
      .setTilesets(tilesets)
      .setObjects(objects)
      .build();
